name: Nitrotype Customizable Colors!
description:
This is a sheet that allows you to change the color of nitro type's logo, titles, text color, and just about everything in the test input box.

All colors to change can be found in the :root selector
additional_info:
Only change the hex values in the :root selector (unless you know what you're doing, of course).

If you have any questions, concerns, or requests, please comment them below.

I do plan on adding more to this, but I think that right now this is a great start.
